title: kandA vEl murugA
sahitya:
kandA vEl murugA (malaiyurai) (pazhanimalaiyurai) murugA


anupallavi

  enda nALum unnai vizhaindu vENDinEn Isha maganE vA vA punnanagai mukhamODu agamagizha


caraNam    cintai agalAdE (en) (nIyen) vindai manidariDai sondam nI enru unnai nADinEn
kandanE aravindan maruganE tEnAm kAvaDi cindu paDikka selvanE
				(madhyamakAla)
kaNamAyilum enai maravAdum vazhi  kATTi vAzhum vagai kUra virandu vA
guNam pugalvAi kumarA enngam nirai unnaruLuDanE endan
